svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Global change over the last 50 years
Global change across various socioeconomic and environmental parameters over the past 50 years, measured as an
index relative to the year 1965 (i.e. values in 1965 = 100).
Source: Global Change Indexes - OWID based on various sources
